ej,lamog101,M,garcr901,Arguing that Ryan should be ejected ej,ventr001,P,fordd901,Charging Nolan Ryan after HBP $Robin Ventura charged the mound after being hit by the first pitch from Nolan Ryan; Ryan got Ventura in a head lock and landed a few punches on the top of Ventura's head and one to his face; both benches cleared and a scrum ensued; once the event had calmed down, White Sox manager Gene Lamont ran into the group yelling at Ryan and another shoving match started; Ventura was ejected by HP umpire Dale FOrd; Lamont was ejected by 3B umpire Richie Garcia for arguing that Ryan should be ejected
